name: test_post_body_negative[cluster_POST_negative_Drop fields with Required=True]
description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.
descriptionHtml:
Negative cases of request body testing
Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

steps.name: Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.value: <Endpoints.Cluster: Endpoint(path='cluster', methods=[<Methods.GET: Method(function=<function get at 0x7f9eee428a60>, url_template='/{name}/{id}/', default_success_code=<HTTPStatus.OK: 200>)>, <Methods.LIST: Method(function=<function get at 0x7f9eee428a60>, url_template='/{name}/', default_success_code=<HTTPStatus.OK: 200>)>, <Methods.POST: Method(function=<function post at 0x7f9eee428c10>, url_template='/{name}/', default_success_code=<HTTPStatus.CREATED: 201>)>], data_class=<class 'tests.utils.data_classes.ClusterFields'>)>

testStage.description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

steps.name: Assert - All fields without body checks - Missing in request: name, cluster_type_id
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - name: ['The name field is required.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - cluster_type_id: ['The cluster type id field is required.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
